title: EzyRez - Reservation & Trust Accounting Software
description: Now in our 16th year and used throughout Australia and New Zealand, EzyRez enjoys an unparalleled and enviable reputation for our commitment to our ...
header_text: Baker Affleck Moffrey - Certified Accounting Partner
Resort Management Licensing and Training - Certified Partner
Buying a Business Already Running EzyRez
Motels, Serviced Apartments, Boutique Hotels, B&B's
Real Estate Holiday Property Management / Holiday Letting
Feature rich property management software program
Motels, Serviced Apartments, Boutique Hotels, B&B's
paragraph_text: Each month we hold a full day session on “EzyRez Essentials”. This session will cover all the basics, entering bookings, rates, owners, properties and tenants, setting up the general configuration, housekeeping, receipting, charges, payments and balancing. This is a great course for those new to EzyRez or newly employed staff.
Full training notes provided and training is hands on using our training PC's. EzyRez has dedicated training facilities for seminar or PC based classroom style learning.
Courses run on an as needs basis, call to register your interest.
For more information or to register call 07 5519 5955 or email

Because your property management system is at the very core of your business, you may need to interface to other software programs or web applications in order to enhance the effectiveness of each solution.
At EzyRez we are committed to providing our clients with connectivity tools that streamline your daily operations, saving time and increasing your organisation's productivity.

EzyRez interfaces to call accounting software, internet billing software, online booking engines, channel management, in house movies and much more.  Follow the links under the Interfaces menu for more information.
If you would like to interface your application to EzyRez, contact our development team as we are always adding new functionality for the benefit of our clients and would welcome your enquiry.

EzyRez Certified IT Partners are specialists in their fields and hold relevant industry certifications.  To get the most out of the extensive features in EzyRez, Certified IT Partners can ensure that IT infrastructure is properly set up and maintained.   Typical services include EzyRez installations and upgrades, networking, back ups, Microsoft SBS Server, SQL and Outlook administration, anti virus and PC hardware.

Rampant Technology are accredited network engineers holding certifications from Microsoft in Windows® systems and networking, plus Symantec and AVG for anti-virus and system security, as well as licensed electricians and qualified data/phone cabling providers. Providing all forms of computer support to the property industry for many years – telephone, email, printing, installations, internet access, anti virus, networking, office relocations, system security, data/phone/power cabling, as well as general maintenance, troubleshooting and repairs – we make systems work properly.

EzyRez Certified Accounting Partners are businesses that are specialists in their fields and ensure you get the most out of the extensive features in EzyRez. To find your nearest EzyRez Certified Accounting Partner simply select from the list below.

Baker Affleck Moffrey Chartered Accountants has been established on the Gold Coast since 1957. In addition to over 50 years of providing traditional accounting services, Baker Affleck Moffrey is renowned for its specialist focus in the areas of:

Baker Affleck Moffrey clients benefit from a completely fresh approach to accounting advice. Their team has a passion for helping businesses grow by understanding their financial position and seeking opportunities to build a more sustainable and profitable future.
Providing Marketing Consulting Services and Products

EzyRez Certified Marketing Partners specialise in providing marketing consulting services and or products that can assist clients to attract bookings.  EzyRez Certified Marketing Partners are dedicated industry professionals who commit to one or more of the following; knowing EzyRez and especially EzyRez Online Premier, being familiar with agent set up and processing, understanding the SMS, email and print marketing capabilities of EzyRez and attending regular training on product upgrades and other important topics.

At eTourism we believe a Resort's website should be the centrepiece of its online distribution channel. We believe a Resort's website should sell more accommodation than any other channel! If it doesn't, then we would love to work with you to fix this. eTourism is a Resort and Apartment marketing company offering pay-per-performance strategies to assist your accommodation business generate more direct online reservations. We have proven results backed by a guarantee to provide our services free of charge if we do not reach our target.
Kim can provide your property with a total sales and marketing solution, and a personalised and tiered consultancy proposal specific to your property's needs.

EzyRez Certified Partners are businesses that are specialists in their fields and ensure you get the most out of the extensive features in EzyRez. To find your nearest EzyRez Certified Partner simply select from the list below.

Servicing the greater Gold Coast and Brisbane areas in Management Rights Consulting, Trust Accounting, and Best Practice, the team at RMLT have years of hands on experience in Management Rights Businesses and as industry trainers.

Our primary response is via the telephone with an average response time of under 8 minutes.  We have a dedicated call centre staffed with a team of former building managers and industry experts who are patient and knowledgeable.  Our focus is to assist our clients to get back to running their business fast.

Our service extends to the ability to view and control our client's PC's (if invited in), meaning that no matter where you are, we can see your screen and assist with even the most complicated of questions.
Are you already a member?  Login to the
section for useful information and product upgrades.

To help you get the most out of EzyRez, we have a dedicated team of experienced property management professionals, who are available to provide training and consulting in your office on the issues that are the most important to your business.

Assisted program set up and configuration, one on one training, front office processing, housekeeping, balancing, end of month, new staff training, change in bank accounts, change of business ownership, and advanced program functions, to name a few.
Our consultants are very patient and knowledgeable and training is conducted at a level and a pace that is suited to your needs.  Consulting is charged on a per hour as needs basis.

For local clients in greater Brisbane and the Gold Coast, we typically come on site to your premises.  For clients outside of this area, the power of the internet means that you can still benefit from our consulting services, as we have tools that allow us to view and control your PC screen just as if we were actually there.
So no matter where your business is located, we can provide quality training and consulting, to help you get the most out of EzyRez.

If your business' data is in an existing database, chances are we can migrate your data over to EzyRez.  This means that changing to EzyRez from your current property management system is really easy and you don't have to worry about re-keying data or losing important information.

For a busy office, this means that you can focus on taking full advantage of our extensive features from the day EzyRez is installed in your office, minimising down time and maximising the benefits of changing to EzyRez.

Under most cases we are able to migrate rooms, owners, past bookings, forward bookings, deposits held, outstanding debtor accounts and more.  For more information on converting to EzyRez from your existing property management system, contact our sales team.

Our experienced team make the process of implementing EzyRez into your office a breeze.  We can tailor a solution to your needs, incorporating installation, coordination with your IT firm as required, scheduled consultations, training courses and data migration.
If you are in the process of setting up a new office, talk to our team about our generous lead in times that help you hit the ground running on opening day.

More than 70% of businesses using EzyRez have changed from our competitor's software at some stage.  We have become experts at ensuring a smooth transition with minimum disruption to your business.  For more information go to Data Conversions under the Services menu.

You've grown your business and are now ready to get computerised.  We can help you translate your existing manual processes into EzyRez for accelerated efficiencies and a greater service delivery to your owners and tenants.

Pre settlement is the best time to properly evaluate the software systems used in the business you are buying.  Outdated software, or software not designed for the style of business that you are buying could impact on your ability to meet your corporate objectives.  Our team can ensure that your business has the right tools for the job and can meet the needs of all stakeholders from day one.

Our Management Change service ensures a smooth transition between the old and new management team.  Our step by step procedure assists in closing off the old account(s) and the opening balances of the new account(s).

If you've owned a business that operated EzyRez, or worked in an office using our program, then we'd love to welcome you back.  Talk to our sales team about our loyalty program and we'll have you set up in no time.

EzyRez Central Rez is a full featured Central Reservations utility featuring, live availability, pricing and guest content for your Resort Group. Central Rez Integrates a full drill down to view the actual booking grid for each property, the ability to see all detail for each booking, a seamless communication link, the ability to provide a secure login and or Web Service feed for agents and affiliates, and powerful web application for your group's public web presence.
Contact us today for more information

Ezy WS is a fully functional bi directional Web Service allowing a seamless link between online service providers and EzyRez. Ezy WS allows EzyRez users to link up their live availability and current prices, query online content, and accept seamless bookings, guest charges and other content directly into the front office PMS.

EzyRez users can select which online services that they wish to participate in, maintaining full control over their business' distribution and online presence. Developed using the latest techniques, Ezy WS is the future of bridging the gap between the PMS and 3rd party developers.
Contact us today for more information

Ezy Switch is a utility that allows EzyRez users to provide a data feed to their chosen after hours / night switch provider. The system facilitates; in house guest call transfers, late arrivals, new same day bookings checking in after hours, and the ability for your provider to handle reservation enquiries and bookings at any time of the day or night. Ezy Switch means that you have reception covered in emergencies, when you need to go out shopping or to dinner or while you're watching your favourite TV show.
Contact us today for more information

EzyRez is committed to providing the highest quality on-line ticketing system currently available to you, as well as a high standard of service from our helpful team. We are working tirelessly to provide products for you to sell through EzyRez, allowing you an easy way to make great commissions.  The system features an automatic log in to TicketMates, and a seamless charge to the guest's account. EzyTours is included in your monthly EzyRez subscription.
TicketMates ExperienceOz now embedded into EzyRez Online Premier!

The system prompts guests to book their trips and tours on successful completion of an online booking. It’s all about increasing add on revenue, as the system will load each resort’s specific TicketMates Experience site direct from the booking confirmation to ensure every ticketing opportunity can be realized. EzyRez leads the way in online connectivity, and is again at the forefront of working with new technology to ensure maximum benefit for all EzyRez Online Premier users.
For more information contact Clint Gudenswager from TicketMates on 0415 238 880 or Email
Make it Personal! We can upload your own web banner to personalise ExperienceOz (see example).
Contact us today for more information
Touch Screen Point of Sale System

EzyRez POS is a full featured touch screen POS system with a live seamless link into EzyRez for charging to guest accounts. With a comprehensive inventory back end and data feeds to both MYOB and Quicken, this system is simple for staff to operate, yet extremely powerful. EzyRez POS has fantastic flexibility and is fully scalable and customisable to your needs.
Suitable for restaurants, cafes, kiosks, retail, take aways and many other applications.
Contact us today for more information

"REI Master", and the REI Master logo are registered trademarks of REI Master Pty Ltd.

The contents of this web site are protected by copyright law. Copyright in this material resides with REI Master Pty Ltd T/As EzyRez.  No part of this site may be reproduced, copied, retransmitted or modified in any way without the express permission of the copyright owner.

REI Master Pty Ltd T/As EzyRez is committed to protecting your privacy. We lawfully collect personal information that is necessary for our business to function. The information we collect and hold will depend upon the products and services you request from us.  This information will include your name, address and contact details and information derived from communications between us and you.  We use the information we collect for the purpose disclosed at the time of collection, or otherwise as set out in this Privacy Statement. We will not use your personal information for any other purpose without first seeking your consent, unless authorised or required by law.

Generally we will only use and disclose your personal information to establish and maintain your relationship as a customer of REI Master Pty Ltd T/As EzyRez, to provide the products and services you have requested from us, to administer and manage those products and services, to answer your enquiry, and for direct marketing of any products or services we believe you may be interested in.

If we contact you in a way without obtaining your prior consent, we will provide you with the opportunity to decline any further marketing communications. If you at any time receive any communication from us which you would not like to receive, please contact us and we will discontinue such communication.  If you have a complaint relating to our handling of your private information, please contact us and we will take any necessary corrective action within reasonable grounds, and respond to your complaint within 30 days.

REI Master will take reasonable steps to keep secure any personal information which we hold and to keep this information accurate and up to date. Personal information is stored in a secure server or secure files.
It may be necessary for us to review and revise our Privacy Policy from time to time. An amended version will be posted on our website.

Our remote support tool allows us to view and control your PC screen, if you invite us in.  This facility means we can implement and train you in our software, no matter where you are, so long as you are connected to the internet.  We also use this tool to provide quality hands on product support - it's just like we've turned up to your office!
Our meetings and webinar tool allows us to conduct feature rich internet presentations including sales presentations, online seminars, group discussion and collaboration and much more.
If directed by the EzyRez support team, click on the button below to allow remote access.
Warning : Clicking on the button below will enable remote access to your PC. If you do not wish to participate, do not click on the button.
If directed by the EzyRez support team, click the button below to join a meeting or attend a webinar.
Enter your Support Password and Press "Enter"
(NB: Passwords are case sensitive - use capital letters)
Please contact us on 07 5519 5955 or email

Turtle Beach Resort is one of Australia's largest Management Rights operations with over 300 units spread over a large site on the Gold Coast Highway at Mermaid Beach.  Executive General Manager Stephen West and his team have undertaken some massive changes including converting the tennis court into a water park!  EzyRez was implemented soon after settlement with a comprehensive data migration from their old system.  According to Stephen there has been "a dramatic increase" in online bookings since changing to EzyRez, testament to the power and ease of use of this highly connected system.

EzyRez was implemented at Xanadu on the day of settlement with all data migrated and reconciled to the trust account on the same day.  Husband and wife team Duncan and Andre then set about growing the business with a strong focus on customer service and room cleanliness.  Their efforts have paid off having been named No.1 on TripAdvisor for 2015.

Gold Coast ARAMA president Simon Lill has a growing Management Rights portfolio to his name.  In choosing a software program to suit the needs of his business, Simon's team evaluated 3 programs including EzyRez.  EzyRez was unanimously chosen and several buildings then experienced a smooth data migration from their old systems.  EzyRez is now an integral part of Simon's business with huge time saving and efficiency features, allowing Simon to go for growth.
Read through testimonials provided by some of our key clients.

We changed from the old system to EzyRez on the day of settlement and changing was easy. The team at EzyRez are extremely helpful and knowledgeable. The EzyRez system has so many advanced features over the old system which has saved our staff countless hours of work per week. With full integration to our touch screen Point Of Sale system at the bar and kiosk, and a real commitment to our business needs, changing to EzyRez has helped us focus on greater efficiencies and growing our business.

We changed our Property Management System to EzyRez upon our purchase of Turtle Beach Resort. Our need was for a system that was flexible enough to deal with 300 apartments and a multitude of wholesalers. It was also imperative to implement a system that was synergised with our online booking system and channel management.

Since it's installation we have added point of sale modules in our 2 restaurants and convenience shop which integrate into the guest account in EzyRez. We have recently added the latest developed module which allows us to timetable and guest charge our two tennis courts, Kids Club and Day Spa.  This not only allows scheduling but seamless chargeback and cost centre reporting.  The beauty of the product is that you can use all or just a few of the included features.

Comprehensive reporting allows us to identify trends and react accordingly to manage our rates.  The EzyChannel manager delivers us bookings 24/7 and last minute availability is the only way properties should be handling vacancies to ensure maximum yield. The business' online bookings have increased dramatically since changing to EzyRez.

The EzyRez support is superb. Their development team work closely with us for the timely delivery of system refinements and new features.  I believe EzyRez is the most superior product on the market and I highly recommend it.

EzyRez was our first choice when we realised how vital it was that we upgrade to a software program which could simplify our booking process & trust accounting. From the first day we began operating the EzyRez system, we have been so impressed with the attention to detail, the regular upgrades and the service offered by the EzyRez support team. As we have a reasonably large letting pool, but a small staff with limited computer knowledge, EzyRez has cut our workload, improved our professionalism and reduced any possibility of booking or trust accounting errors to zero. I would not hesitate to recommend EzyRez as the first choice in Reservation & Trust Accounting Software.

I changed our software to EzyRez in all of our buildings a year and a half ago. It was one of the best decisions I ever made. The change over was very smooth and the service from the support team was and still is exceptional. I was also very impressed with their forward thinking and receptive attitude regarding ongoing enhancements to the software. Most importantly though, EzyRez connects me to my online booking sources in a way that my old software just couldn't.

We have been using EzyRez at Gemini Court for the last 3 years. We were very nervous about moving from our previous provider but found the transition to be smooth and easy.  EzyRez made sure we were kept informed about the process during transition and his support team have been second to none in the time we have been with them.

The efficiency, ease and support provided by the EzyRez team is commendable. The End of Month process is straight forward. The system itself is uncomplicated – all our front desk staff were able to pick it up quickly, allowing for a painless transition.

EzyRez has also allowed us to see exponential growth with online bookings, thus generating higher revenues increasing efficiencies and distribution through our online agents. It allows us to sell every last room. It has never been easier using EzyRez Online as it gives us the ability to streamline processes and expand global reach – all in one integrated hotel distribution and connectivity solution.

Gemini Court Holiday Apartments is a proud supporter of EzyRez.  We will happily answer any questions with management teams that would like more information about the program itself, the transition, reporting or End of Month.

With many years in IT before entering Management Rights, we were looking for a system which matched our high expectations for quality, consistency, reliability, attention to detail and ease of operation. When upgrading our Reservations & Trust Accounting System we chose EzyRez, not only for the quality system but also for their exceptional Customer Service. The team at EzyRez has provided us with excellent service from preparing us for our upgrade to listening to our feedback and providing solutions to specific requirements. We highly recommend EzyRez to any property considering upgrading their Reservations and Trust Accounting Software.

Jan & I researched all available reservations/trust software prior to leaving Melbourne just over 4 years ago. This has been our first management rights business. Jan had not used a computer before, so we were looking for a program that was easy to learn and easy to understand. On arriving at Contessa, we decided to change over to EzyRez as soon as possible. We have not regretted the move! EzyRez continuously upgrade their software and we consider them to be industry leaders and very innovative in their approach. Built from scratch as a "Windows" product, it performs well on a network and forms and reporting happen just as you would want. End of month is a breeze! Support is excellent and any problems are resolved quickly. I would be happy to recommend the EzyRez team.

Our core software is aimed at the serviced apartment, management rights, motel, real estate holiday letting, backpacker, B&B and boutique hotel industries.  Combined with our core feature set are a number of functions, some unique to our software, aimed at niche industries with particular requirements.

Holiday property management, trust accounting, on site and off site unit management, comprehensive tools for marketing, analysis, online connectivity and bookings, channel management, housekeeping, agents, full owner accounting, permanent tenants, 3rd party interfaces, SMS, email, trips and tours and more.

Property management, comprehensive tools for marketing, analysis, online connectivity and bookings, yielding, channel management, housekeeping, agents, 3rd party interfaces, Point of Sale connectivity, user security, SMS, email, trips and tours and more.

Holiday property management, trust accounting, comprehensive tools for marketing, analysis, online connectivity and bookings, channel management, housekeeping, agents, full owner accounting, permanent tenants, 3rd party interfaces, SMS, email, trips and tours and more.

Property management including per bed sale, comprehensive tools for marketing, analysis, online connectivity and bookings, yielding, channel management, housekeeping, agents, 3rd party interfaces, Point of Sale connectivity, user security, SMS, email, trips and tours and more.
We also have solutions for real estate, property management and permanent management rights offices.  For more information go to www.reimaster.com.au.
In addition to the interfaces detailed from the Interfaces menu, EzyRez can connect to the  following services either directly or via an intermediary provider.
In addition to these functions our open data policy and continued development will ensure that our clients can always be connected to new services as they become available.

EzyRez can receive billing information from intermediary products like Infoden and MPi32, offering connectivity to all of the popular on demand movie providers.  Additional features include adult content control and movie access control (automatic and manual).
Importantly, the interface to on demand movie providers via our interface partners is included in an EzyRez subscription, unlike many of our competitors where it is sold with an add on cost.
Any 3rd party on demand movie provider can easily interface to the EzyRez guest data via our standardised file schema.  Contact our office for more information.
EzyRez connects directly or via a 3rd party intermediary to a huge range of internet billing software providers.  Internet usage can be billed directly to the guest's account.
Any 3rd party internet billing provider can easily interface to the EzyRez guest data via our standardised file schema.  Contact our office for more information.

Ensure a seamless link between your PABX system and your guest's account with our call accounting interfaces.  By connecting to popular products like Infoden Logger and MPi32, EzyRez can interface with a huge range of telephone equipment for guest billing purposes.
Other features include housekeeping control, wake ups, and other controls via the telephone system.
Importantly, the interface to call accounting providers is included in an EzyRez subscription, unlike many of our competitors where the capability to interface is sold with an add on cost.
Any 3rd party call accounting provider can easily interface to the EzyRez guest data via our standardised file schema.  Contact our office for more information.

EzyRez offers our own full featured booking engine - EzyRez Online (see Products menu).  For clients wishing to connect use one of the huge range of other booking engines now available, EzyRez can provide a seamless two way link.  This means that availability and pricing can be fed up to your chosen booking engine, with bookings dropping straight into EzyRez.
Choose the marketing options that best suit your business, then take full advantage of them by connecting your business to the world via EzyRez.

Are you currently using a competitor's program that can't connect to your chosen booking engine?  You're almost certain to be losing revenue to businesses that have their property management system and booking engine connected.  EzyRez offers an impressive range of connectivity choices with our full open data policy.

EzyRez has a comprehensive web service in place with full API documentation.  If an EzyRez client would benefit from connecting to your booking engine, contact our development team as we are always adding new functionality for the benefit of our clients and would welcome your enquiry.

EzyRez offers our own high quality channel management utility - EzyChannel (see Products menu).  For clients wishing to connect their data to the myriad of other channel management tools now available, EzyRez can provide a seamless two way link.  This means that availability and pricing can be fed up to your chosen channel manager, with bookings dropping straight into EzyRez.
Choose the marketing options that best suit your business, then take full advantage of them by connecting your business to the world via EzyRez.

Are you currently using a competitor's program that can't connect to your chosen channel manager?  You're almost certain to be losing revenue to businesses that have their property management system and channel manager connected.  EzyRez offers an impressive range of connectivity choices with our full open data policy.

EzyRez has a comprehensive web service in place with full API documentation.  If an EzyRez client would benefit from connecting to your channel management program, contact our development team as we are always adding new functionality for the benefit of our clients and would welcome your enquiry.
As a resort professional, you need the latest technology. You need to be able to reach your guests no matter where they are, efficiently and professionally.
With Ezy SMS you can respond to enquiries, confirm bookings, implement effective marketing campaigns, and much more all from one program.
Some suggested ways to use Ezy SMS include;
Prices start from 9c per SMS ex GST. SMS goes directly to your target audience and can be personalised including your guest's name, booking dates and account information.
Contact us today for more information
Quite simply, the most powerful marketing tool available.

EzyChannel is EzyRez's channel management utility.  This tool will allow you to maintain your inventory and pricing for all online distribution points, within one easy to use interface.  Featuring a large number of connected sites (see below) and backed up by on going development and quality IT infrastructure, EzyChannel will allow you to secure bookings before your competitor does.

For EzyRez Online Premier clients, the system is true "set and forget" with full integration to EzyRez for availability and pricing. Bookings can drop straight into the system, saving time and eliminating data entry errors.
EzyChannel allows users to maximise booking opportunities, yield for best tariff outcomes and control seasons and special dates, all while keeping all sites up to date with the latest information.

Contact us today for more information

EzyRez Online is a live, real time web reservation system enabling your guests to search availability and book securely online via your web page. Bookings made from your web page automatically show up in EzyRez. That means no re keying of data. Rates and availability are seamlessly fed to your web page meaning you don't have to manage complex allotments or worry about double bookings.  EzyRez Online has allowed our members to process close to half a billion dollars of online bookings and is growing daily.
For a demonstration of EzyRez Online in action go to:
Contact us today for more information

EzyRez is a feature rich property management software program.  The best way to see all that the program offers to your business is to book a demonstration with one of our consultants.  No matter where you are, so long as you have access to the internet, we can give you and your team a comprehensive overview including examples specific to your style of business.
Contact us today for more information
We’d love to hear from you. Contact us for more information on our products and services, or for a no obligation presentation!
You can also get in touch with us the following ways

Take exit 57 off the M1 headed toward Sanctuary Cove, and turn immediately right onto Siganto Drive.  Siganto Drive is parallel to the M1 on the Southbound side. We are located in the “Siganto Plaza” complex on the ground floor.

You could be the person we've been looking for. Do you want to take your career to the next level? We are hiring now - permanent full time, based at Helensvale on the Gold Coast. Positions available from junior to senior level. Full training provided.
EzyRez is a fast growing company looking for highly motivated, experienced individuals committed to excellence.
Working at EzyRez gives you the opportunity to enhance your career with an emphasis on personal growth and development. EzyRez values its personnel and offers challenging & rewarding careers.

EzyRez is looking for people with experience in the management rights, motel, holiday letting and information technology industries. If you are looking for an exciting career change, submit your current CV to

We are a rapidly growing, dynamic software company providing solutions to the hospitality industry. We have experienced massive growth in our user base over recent years, by providing quality products and an unparalleled and enviable reputation for service.

Our range of software packages have been developed by software professionals with many years of experience and a commitment to listening to our customers' needs. Our software has been engineered using the latest programming techniques and principles required by today's computing environment. We pride ourselves on producing powerful software that is highly flexible, robust, well tested and above all easy to use.
Our software will efficiently and effectively manage and control every aspect of your business with our innovative techniques and our high standards for excellence.
For management rights, serviced apartments, motels, real estate holiday letting, hotels, backpackers, tourist parks, B & B's, marinas and boat hire, search this site for more information.
For real estate offices, property management offices and permanent management rights go to
At EzyRez we employ a talented team of  professionals, all dedicated to the success of our clients.  We live and breathe Property Management - just like you!
EzyRez is an integrated reservation, trust accounting and property management software package designed to meet the complex needs of today's building managers.

EzyRez has modules specific to management rights, motels, serviced apartments, real estate, holiday property management, holiday letting, hotels, backpackers, B & B's and marinas. Now in our 16th year and used throughout Australia and New Zealand, EzyRez enjoys an unparalleled and enviable reputation for our commitment to our customers through our dedicated professional support centre and continued product development.

EzyRez trust accounting software is ideal for running all aspects of your management rights or real estate holiday letting business.  The powerful trust accounting software features include comprehensive trust accounting, easy and flexible owner accounting, full audit trail, easy balancing and end of month, a dynamic, drag and drop bookings grid, online bookings, channel mangement, comprehensive reporting and marketing tools, detailed analysis and houskeeping functions, touch screen point of sale and much more.

EzyRez trust accounting software is suitable from the smallest to largest of businesses and is backed up by our famous service and on going development.  Choose from the above menu for more information about EzyRez trust accounting software.

Our core software is aimed at the serviced apartment, management rights, motel, real estate holiday letting, backpacker, B&B and boutique hotel industries.  Combined with our core feature set are a number of functions, some unique to our software, aimed at niche industries with particular requirements.

Holiday property management, trust accounting, on site and off site unit management, comprehensive tools for marketing, analysis, online connectivity and bookings, channel management, housekeeping, agents, full owner accounting, permanent tenants, 3rd party interfaces, SMS, email, trips and tours and more.

Property management, comprehensive tools for marketing, analysis, online connectivity and bookings, yielding, channel management, housekeeping, agents, 3rd party interfaces, Point of Sale connectivity, user security, SMS, email, trips and tours and more.

Holiday property management, trust accounting, comprehensive tools for marketing, analysis, online connectivity and bookings, channel management, housekeeping, agents, full owner accounting, permanent tenants, 3rd party interfaces, SMS, email, trips and tours and more.

Property management including per bed sale, comprehensive tools for marketing, analysis, online connectivity and bookings, yielding, channel management, housekeeping, agents, 3rd party interfaces, Point of Sale connectivity, user security, SMS, email, trips and tours and more.
We also have solutions for real estate, property management and permanent management rights offices.  For more information go to www.reimaster.com.au.
